page.title: 17Town Twinning
page.content: Colney Heath village is twinned with {Boissy sous Saint Yon}which is in France. Keys of Boissy were presented on the 25th of September 1982 by Monsieur Amuary Courderc to John Prodger,Chairman of Colney Heath Parish Council.It all started when Colney Heath sent out letters to towns in France.Boissy replied and we thought they were a suitable town because it was the same size as{Colney {Heath}and the same distance from{Paris as Colney Heath is from{London. There are about 300 people in the twinning association.The twinning works like this.A French family comes over to Britain to their English friends and vice versa.We have barbecues,football matches,dances, food, drink,outings and festivals.
